About Me

Here's My Story

Hello! I am a student at Haliç University, aiming to enhance my interest and experience in software development. I am a dedicated student who is committed to continually improving myself in the field of software development and gaining valuable experience. Thanks to my suitability for teamwork and strong work discipline, I have honed my abilities to contribute to every project and achieve team goals. As a member of the board of directors of the Haliç C.O.D.E club at Haliç University, I have been able to strengthen my leadership skills and contribute value to club activities. Through the responsibilities and tasks I have undertaken, I am focused on acquiring more knowledge and skills in software development. Alongside relevant courses, I gain practical experience through personal projects and club activities. Additionally, I stay updated on current trends and technological advancements in software development, ensuring that my knowledge in this field remains up-to-date. My ultimate goal is to advance and succeed in the software industry.
